topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) 1.1: Manage Your Cloud

body.p: The HP Helion OpenStack(R) dashboards are browser-based interfaces that enable you to manage your entire cloud environment.
The dashboards are based on OpenStack(R) Horizon and provide enhanced features.

ul.li: How to use the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Dashboards — Describes the Project and Administration dashboard user interface dialogs and options.
Using HP Helion OpenStack(R) for Users — Describes the Operational Dashboard user interface dialogs and options.

body.p: Note: Administrators can perform all of the user tasks in addition to the admin tasks.
